channel.title: What is a good source to start on?
channel.description: I would like one where i can edit items and have like dragon whip and all that. Just looking for a good starting base that i can add npcs and items to, thanks for your help.

item.title: What is a good source to start on?
item.dc:creator: @dank_k0 dank k0
item.description:
@dank_k0 wrote:

[quote=“xjadefighter, post:7, topic:259652”][quote author=dank k0 link=topic=342878.msg2649813#msg2649813 date=1233464719]
uhm what about models? :S
how do I know if its open or closed?
Make my own client?! little confused

as of now i just want my own server that i can open that can be changed easily if that makes sense at all… what i mean is that i can change like colors on weapons ( like dragon whip ) or change the +stat bonuses of items like phats having +20 str
[/quote]

U can download like a all-star source its a great starter source and u can download a client with all those items added just go through some pages in the downloads section.[/quote]

uhm ive looked through some of them, can you just help me try and connect? i have client and source but nothing is working for me, can you tell me how this is supposed to work? like step by step instructions on how to open everything, i think i have everything downloaded

Read full topic

item.title: What is a good source to start on?
item.dc:creator: @xjadefighter xjadefighter
item.description:
@xjadefighter wrote:

[quote=“dank k0, post:6, topic:259652”]uhm what about models? :S
how do I know if its open or closed?
Make my own client?! little confused

as of now i just want my own server that i can open that can be changed easily if that makes sense at all… what i mean is that i can change like colors on weapons ( like dragon whip ) or change the +stat bonuses of items like phats having +20 str[/quote]

U can download like a all-star source its a great starter source and u can download a client with all those items added just go through some pages in the downloads section.

item.title: What is a good source to start on?
item.dc:creator: @xjadefighter xjadefighter
item.description:
@xjadefighter wrote:

[quote=“dank k0, post:3, topic:259652”][quote author=xjadefighter link=topic=342878.msg2649802#msg2649802 date=1233464040]
umm… theres a lot like all-star, Deltascape, and more just look on the downloads section.

Also good luck on the server you make.
[/quote]

can i just use any client and just edit stuff in it?[/quote]
Umm… pretty much just make sure it’s a open client and not a closed one.
Also if u don’t how to add models just look in the models section for a TuT

Read full topic
